Sentencas: (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O-3 (LSCF) perovskites are well known promising materials for cathodes of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: First Principles Modeling of Pd-doped (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 Complex Perovskites

Sentencas: In order to reduce cathode operational temperature, doping on B-sublattice with different metals was suggested.
Titulo: First Principles Modeling of Pd-doped (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 Complex Perovskites

Sentencas: Indeed, as it was shown recently experimentally, doping with low Pd content increases oxygen vacancy concentration which is one of factors controlling oxygen transport in fuel cells.
Titulo: First Principles Modeling of Pd-doped (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 Complex Perovskites

Sentencas: In this Communication, we modeled this material using first principles DFT calculations combined with supercell model.
Titulo: First Principles Modeling of Pd-doped (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 Complex Perovskites

Sentencas: The charge density redistribution, density of states, and local lattice distortion around palladium ions are analyzed and reduction of the vacancy formation energy confirmed.
Titulo: First Principles Modeling of Pd-doped (La,Sr)(Co,Fe)O3 Complex Perovskites
